item.title: Report X-2024070337
item.description:
Report X-2024070337

Identified by scraper @ 2024-07-09T15:13:05+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-06-10
  • City: SEA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: ALASKA AIRLINES, INC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: The shipment was taken to the warehouse where the RSA asked if there were any items that would be hazardous. The shipper did not report a bottle of Isopropyl alcohol (473 ml) and a lithium battery powered trimmer. Items would have flown on a passenger carrying aircraft, AS232 11JUN
